title: Gameplay bug- Debonair Galio- wings missing something
body:
debonair galio's wings seem to be missing some elements to them.
I've played with him 2 games and it has happened both times. 
I noticed it from the start, so i do not believe items are a cause.
I am playing form a MacBook Air. system is up-to-date. 
i have added several photos displaying the bugginess. hope this was helpful....
1st galio skin and id like it to be a memorable one! thank you riot! for everything!

replies.body: While you are (possibly) here, can you please tell us if Riot is aware/has started working on the bug with Mac-users that causes glitches such as being perma-taunted once you auto someone, unable to use abilities correctly/in general, etc.? It would be nice to know if you were as I would like to be able to play games again and I'm sure most other Mac-users would too.

Hey AZUR3,

This is actually not a bug and are how the wings are [designed](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/champions-skins/skin-release/debonair-galio-doesnt-always-go-mid-lane).
